storyInfo: Horn and Misery cover the Self-Salvation Corps' evacuation, and the Last Steam Knight appears at the most crucial moment. W arrives to lend Feist's team her support, while the Glasgow Gang in Norport is beginning to run low on supplies.

attributes.content: Guh... Urgh...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: I really... don't have anything here.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Bollocks! We saw it with our own eyes. You used your stove. Where did you get food?
attributes.name: Starving Thug

attributes.content: How come you have something to eat every day?!
attributes.name: Starving Thug

attributes.content: I... I just found it by chance...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Found it?
attributes.name: Starving Thug

attributes.content: Don't go overboard with him. If this guy gets an Oripathy attack, we'll all be dead.
attributes.name: Calm Thug

attributes.content: Where's your storeroom? Spill it!
attributes.name: Starving Thug

attributes.content: I really... Just found them... Someone has been leaving things on my windowsill...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Still trying to hide—
attributes.name: Starving Thug

attributes.content: Are his words really so untrustworthy?
Even the Infected get lucky sometimes and find food, right? What's so strange about that?
And who are you? Here to rob him, too?
attributes.name: Starving Thug

attributes.content: Hello. My name is Red.
Back in my Ursus days, they all called me 'Redblade.'
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Pick up the pace. Stay close.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Hang in there! We're almost there!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Drat! There's more and more of them.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: White Wolf, I've heard about you and your family.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: I'm glad to have the opportunity to fight alongside you today.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: For Londinium, and for Victoria.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: What are you trying to—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Don't stop! Keep moving!
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Sarkaz traitor and Victorian insects, it's high time we brought an end to this game of hide-and-seek.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Where do you want to run? Is it death that you want to escape?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: You and your friends who are hiding in the shadows will all be torn to shreds. It's what you owe us!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: This is what everyone in Londinium, Victoria, and across the lands owe us!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Run. Run! The storm will still arrive. You can't outrun war!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Shut your bloody gob!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: (Gah, too many people. We need to find a way to break through here!)
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: (I only have one grenade left...)
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Robben, take this grenade. Head down, and blow up the bottom deck of power layer.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Misery, protect them. The rest of you need to keep moving forward.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Got it. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: We'll leave the rest to luck.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn... You—
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Shut up. I don't have time to pummel you again.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hurry!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn turns around and faces a wave of enemies surging on her position.
She smirks a little. It is high time this all came to an end.
All this fleeing, the battles, and these sleepless nights.
Soldiers are meant to die in war.
I wonder... what Bagpipe is up to right now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: She tightens her grip on her weapon and prepares to charge.
Under the dark, cloudy sky, a strange sound can be heard zooming in ever closer from afar.
A familiar sound, although it has been a long time since it was last heard in Londinium.
It is only in their distant memories and fuzzy rumors that people can find that sound's source—
That's—
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Horn, run! Take this chance!
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: (Heavy gushing)
attributes.name: 'The Last Steam Knight'

attributes.content: 'Victoria.'
attributes.name: 'The Last Steam Knight'

attributes.content: Drat, these doors—
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: They're too thick. They can't hear us on the other side!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Grr, they took Clovisia and Catherine. Are they trying to use them as bargaining chips with the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: These despicable traitors—
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Shining, can you open them?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We can't delay any longer. We don't know when the Sarkaz will make it here.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I will give it a try.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: No! Don't! Don't make a big show like that! That's only going to draw the enemy here faster!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We have a bunch of critically wounded and non-combatants here. If we actually start fighting the Royal Court guys, even if we can get away, what about them?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We'd only be waiting to meet our maker by remaining here. I don't know what my friends are scheming, but my guys is they have more in mind than keeping us here.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: My drone has a small laser cutting device. These steel plates may be thick, but if you give me some time...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: How long will it take?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Oh, keep your pants on! I need to test the output first...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Feist, do you remember what happened to Old Bill?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: It has to be... One of those monsters has got to have infiltrated us again. He fooled us again!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: We were too careless. We should've noticed sooner!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Feist... Are those Sarkaz who can change their faces here too?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: When those things exist, how... how can we trust anyone?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: What if... that's not what this is?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: They're our allies! They're Londinium workers, too!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I know. I grew up with them.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But what if...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What if this is their decision. This is the choice that Tommy, Patto, and Day made with everybody else?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But why...? We're supposed to be on the same side!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: It's easier to believe that your allies were replaced than to accept that they've betrayed us.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But that's exactly what happened.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I can tell what they were thinking, more or less. Once the rage-induced fervor dissipates, it's not so easy to choose to keep fighting.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Clovisia said as much before too. In the end, we're just a bunch of normal people.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I have to admit that... even I fear leaving, just like them.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Fleeing and cowering... is the most instinctive choice that all normal people make when they are confronted with war.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Then you stay! Stay here with your friends!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I won't do that, Rockrock.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I have to face my fear. That's the only way I can remind myself... of the worth of bravery.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I have faith that they haven't crossed that line. I have faith that they were only sucked into this choice by fear.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But none of it matters now.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I will save Granny and Clovisia, just like I did last time.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But our wounded can't wait much longer.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The drone's laser's working on the door already! It'll take... uh, twenty minutes, maybe?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'll help, too. I have tools on me!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Your hammer and wrench aren't gonna come in handy here.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Be patient. Just hold on a little longer, and we can leave this place safe and...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Wh-What? I didn't catch any Sarkaz movement!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Shining—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Oh, hey, Shining. Been a while. I heard you went to a family reunion?
W, you're here.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: W! Half of Londinium heard that just now!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The curtain's drawn, right? I've always been pretty accurate with my explosives. Just the right amount.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I heard Kal'tsit got beat up real bad, so I thought I'd find some time to come take a look.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Whoa, she did really did take a beating. Theresis doesn't know how to hold back, huh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And here I thought the guy would go gentler on his 'old friend.'
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She's still unconscious.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Well, shit, that's too bad. For me, that is. Should I shed a few tears for her?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Or maybe I oughta take this chance to make sure the old hag never crosses me again?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Muffled braying)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Ugh, that little shit's not dead either?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Menacing growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Hmph, still so nasty.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Mon3tr was very heavily damaged. It wasn't until two hours ago that it recovered its motor functions. I suggest you avoid provoking it.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I'm saving its master's life. At the very least, it's gotta learn to treat me with a bit more respect.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Otherwise, hehe—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Compromising low roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Now that's more like it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The Royal Court fighters are heading this way! Quick, we gotta get out of here before they...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Oh, quit your yapping, Closure. It hurts my ears.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Whose fault do you think that is?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If you're so worried, get your men to move double time already.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I know a couple good spots outside the city. Wanna take a look?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: With the supplies we have on hand, best-case scenario, we should be able to last another week.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: What about worst-case scenario?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Alright, I get it.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Cador and I will keep trying to come up with something.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: What is the situation like outside?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: A borough that normally has less than ten thousand residents suddenly finds its population surging multiple times over. No additional supplies. No police. No law and order.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: We're still alive even after the last several days. We should be thankful that the citizens still have a shred of morality.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: It could also be because Cador's fists pack a punch.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I don't deny that.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Have you heard anything about what the dukes' plans are? I heard... Duke Windermere's barracks aren't far from here.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I'm sure... they won't turn a blind eye to our predicament.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I've heard rumors... Some have said they saw a blaze surge through the night sky.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: We all saw that flying thing the Sarkaz had... On the day we were cast out of Londinium, its shadow swept through the entire plate.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: My guess is that the dukes are all very fearful of that, and they're only probing how to attack it right now.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Of course, it's also possible that the outside world has gone to hell, and Londinium has been bombed to smithereens. Who knows?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Maybe the dukes don't know that there are still people alive here?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Maybe... they thought all of us... died.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: If only we had a way to get word out...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: What way? The intercity net is completely paralyzed.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Hapless sods trapped in the lockdown zone like us should just worry about whether we'll have anything to eat tomorrow.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: It's hard to believe that just a few days ago, we were still watching that awful Wrankwood movie in the video shop.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: What was that movie called again? War of the Mutant Geeks?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The ending was actually pretty touching, though.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I wouldn't know. I fell asleep. All I saw was the nomadic city getting blown up in the explosion at the very end.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: All I remember is that Mr. McClaren was awfully generous with his money. After all, we helped him deal with the video shop's troubles plenty of times.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I only hope that he is doing well. The situation outside wouldn't do his neurasthenia any favors.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I stopped by the video shop for a look. His door was sealed shut.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Why did you always sleep in the video shop, though? I remember we met each other because...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Because your laughter woke me up.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Sorry, but that movie was really funny.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: But to start, it was your fault for falling asleep there.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: There is no better place to sleep than there.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: That comedy director is really famous. I have all her—
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: An untimely growl that signifies hunger can suddenly be heard, shattering the easygoing atmosphere that the two finally managed to build.
Sorry.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: You've been eating too little. Your stamina won't last if you keep this up.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: It's okay. We need to carry on.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The lives we had came to an end just like that. In an instant, this is what it all turned into.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: There are lunatics and dead bodies everywhere. There are the blockade walls that the Sarkaz built... There have been men attempting to break through them the past couple days. Their brains are still hanging on the walls.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I still don't understand. How did it—
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: War has broken out, Baird.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I know. I know! But just because of those few weightless words...
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Everyone's past disappeared without a trace in the blink of an eye.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Whose war is this?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: The dukes are trying to protect Victoria...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: All I know is that this war is not mine.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: A small, broken stir as well as the clanging of multiple cans can be heard from the shadows.
What are you doing?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: It isn't your turn to stand watch tonight.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: What's that you're hiding underneath your coat?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: S-Stay back!
attributes.name: Timid Citizen
